==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfiːɐ̯tl̩ foːɐ̯/}} ===Preposition=== {{de-prep}} # [[quarter to]], a [[quarter-hour]] before, 15 minutes before {{qualifier|used with the number of the following hour}} #: {{ux|de|Wir treffen uns um '''Viertel vor''' zwei.|We’re meeting at quarter to two.}} ====See also==== * {{l|de|dreiviertel}} * {{l|de|halb}} * {{l|de|viertel}} * {{l|de|Viertel nach}}
